titleInfo.title: Letter, Submission to the House of Representatives by Henry Knox on behalf of Colonel Anthony Walton White, 1797 February 14

mods.abstract: Secretary of War Henry Knox presented this letter to the House of Representatives on February 14, 1791. It is a notice of a memorial presented to Congress and referred to the treasury in which Colonel White is asking for repayment of personal monies he spent on his troops during the war. The letter notes that "although the general principles of said report appear to be judicious and well founded, yet it seems questionable whether they ought to apply decisively in the present case."

titleInfo.title: Greer and Vinsinger Family Collection of American Revolutionary War Documents
Greer and Vinsinger Family Collection of American Revolutionary War Documents
